embeds.title: About Exton Server Pass
embeds.description: Looking to boost your community's safety and efficiency? With the Server Pass, your Discord gets full access to the Exton system – ideal for teams and growing projects. Run Twitter checks directly from your server, monitor reused usernames, and get scam alerts in real-time (soon). Give your roles the tools they need to keep everyone safe.

embeds.title: Tiers
embeds.description:
:warning: *Repeated checks don't count. For more details, see our [docs](https://exton-scam-tracker.gitbook.io/docs) to review our terms and services.*

:warning: *Spots are limited to maintain optimal server performance and ensure dedicated support for all users*

fields.name: Pathfinder (**6% off** → $94.26 for 3 months! :tada: or $32.42 per month)
fields.value:
:white_check_mark: Unlimited reused username checks
:white_check_mark: Allows specific roles to run Twitter checks directly in your server
:white_check_mark: Twitter Monitor with no usage limits (Beta)
:white_check_mark: Access to exclusive role and giveaways
:white_check_mark: Real-time scam checker when a new member joins (coming soon)

:hourglass_flowing_sand: Only 23 spots available
